pageLoader.loading: Kei te tāuta i te whārangi...

loader.entering: E tomo ana ki te ao...

alert.cancelCountdown: Mā te kati i tēnei modal ka whakakore i te tatauranga

gameServer.browserErrorMessage: Kāore tō pūtirotiro e tautoko ana i te rokiroki i te aratau tirotiro tūmataiti. Me ngana tētahi atu pūtirotiro, puta atu rānei i te aratau tirotiro tūmataiti.
gameServer.noAvailableServersMessage: Kāore he tūmau e wātea ana hei hono atu māu. E ngana ana ki te hono anō
gameServer.worldDisconnectedMessage: Kua ngaro i a koe to tūhononga ki te ao. Ka ngana mātou ki te tūhono anō i mua i te paunga o te wā e whai ake nei, ki te kore koe e whakamua ki tētahi tauira kē.
gameServer.webGLNotEnabledMessage: Kāore tō pūtirotiro e tautoko i te WebGL, kua monokia rānei. Whakahohe koa i te WebGL, te whakaaro rānei ki te whakamohoa ki te putanga hōu rawa o tō pūtirotiro.
gameServer.youKickedFromWorld: Kua whana koe i te ao
gameServer.youKickedFromWorldMessage: I whanaina koe i tēnei ao mo te take e whai ake nei
gameServer.misspelledOrNotExist: Tērā pea ka hē, kāore rānei i te tīariari.
gameServer.low-frame-error: I kitea tētahi āhuatanga iti e whakaaro ana he whakahohe i te whakamahi whakaterenga Pūmārō i tō pūtirotiro me te whakapā anō i tō pūtirotiro
gameServer.low-frame-title: Whakahohe whakaterenga pūmārō mō te wheako pai ake!

error.loading-error: I rahua te uta raraunga kaiwhakamahi
